text: Ariful Islam (born 20 December 1996) is a Bangladeshi cricketer. He made his List A debut for Khelaghar Samaj Kallyan Samity in the 2016–17 Dhaka Premier Division Cricket League on 12 April 2017. Prior to his List A debut, he was named in Bangladesh's squad for the 2016 Under-19 Cricket World Cup. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Bangladeshi cricketers Category:Khelaghar Samaj Kallyan Samity cricketers Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Ariful Islam
